articles.author: David Schechter, Chance Horner, Haley Rush, Laura Geller
articles.title: American scientists explore Antarctica for oldest-ever ice to help understand climate change - CBS News
articles.description: Their work near the South Pole means camping on the ice without showers or flushing toilets for seven weeks — but what we can learn about climate change there is essential to science.
articles.content: They're braving some of the highest, driest, coldest and windiest conditions on the planet, but American scientists in Antarctica believe the effort is worth it. They're searching for a sample of the… [+3783 chars]
